name: Rolling Sum
description:
Press  WASD keys to move

Press R to restart (or fall off the map)

Each time you land on a purple tile, the number on top of your dice is added to your points. To reach the next level, go to the sun tile when your points are equal to the number on the sun tile.

HINT: numbers on opposite sides of the dice total 7

Assets from:

Sky: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-stylized-sk...

Clouds: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/3le-low-poly-cloud-pack-65911

Dice Asset: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/packs/dice-pack-light-165
